name: Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King
desc:
Lord of the Mountain: Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King

A mighty Yumkasaurus that has survived since ancient times and seen countless battles.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Dynamic Skin can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
.
Lustrous Skin can only be purchased after obtaining Dynamic Skin.
Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King's Feast

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." "This story was told to me by a friend from Natlan. Beyond prying eyes in a hidden mountain valley lives a giant Yumkasaurus that never stops eating, as though it wishes to consume everything it lays eyes upon..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with the Talent Card "The All-Devourer" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: The All-Devourer
customize.desc:
"The All-Devourer" Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King

"Some tribe members believe that it has its current body shape because it has a unique physique, like the Qucusaur Tyrant... Though in fact, this is simply because it's lived for so long, and eaten way, WAY too much."

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: The All-Devourer
customize.desc:
"The All-Devourer" Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King

"Some tribe members believe that it has its current body shape because it has a unique physique, like the Qucusaur Tyrant... Though in fact, this is simply because it's lived for so long, and eaten way, WAY too much."

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King's Greed

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." "It's been shown that no matter what creature — cat, saurian, or human — uninhibited gluttony causes weight gain, sluggishness, and other undesirable results. I do hope Finnick realizes this before it's too late..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with the Talent Card "The All-Devourer" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King
customize.desc:
Lord of the Mountain: Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King

A mighty Yumkasaurus that has survived since ancient times and seen countless battles.

customize.text:
*Has 35 HP
<color=#ffffffd9>Prerequisite</color>
Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King's Feast

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deal 2 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> and draw 1 Food Card.

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Cannot be</color> <color=#ffffff>satiated</color> <color=#ffffffa6>.</color>
<color=#ffffff>After you play a Food Card:</color> <color=#ffffffa6>Randomly attach 1 stack of</color> <color=#ffffff>Well Fed and Strong</color> <color=#ffffffa6>or</color> <color=#ffffff>Well Fed and Sturdy</color> <color=#ffffffa6>, or gain 1 additional Max HP. (Twice per Round)</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Well Fed and Strong</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Next time you deal damage: +1 DMG. (Can stack. No stack limit)</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Well Fed and Sturdy</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Next time you take damage: -1 DMG. (Can stack. No stack limit)</color>

Applies Dendro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Bloom</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that greants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

Applies Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.

value.name: The All-Devourer
value.desc:
"The All-Devourer" Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King

"Some tribe members believe that it has its current body shape because it has a unique physique, like the Qucusaur Tyrant... Though in fact, this is simply because it's lived for so long, and eaten way, WAY too much."

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King

value.name: Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King
value.desc:
A powerful Yumkasaur that has survived both the ravages of time and countless battles, surviving until the present day.
This "Mountain King," who once joined forces with the great heroes against the Black Tide, holds a special place in the hearts of the Scions of the Canopy. Some tribe members believe that it has its current body shape because it has a unique physique, like the Qucusaurus "Tyrant"... Though in fact, this is simply because it's lived for so long, and eaten way, WAY too much.
